channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukrainian drones reach deep inside Russia as battle for key city rages on
Diddy Is Reportedly Hanging With Former NBA Star In Prison

Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 03-32-40-43-57, Powerball: 18

item.title: What's on the ballot in the first general election since Donald Trump became president
item.description: Donald Trump features prominently in state and local elections happening Tuesday, a year after he retook the White House

item.title: Justice Department defends Trump's post as it urges judge to reject Comey's effort to dismiss case
Driver convicted of murder after his truck plowed into July 4 BBQ in NYC, killing 4
item.description: A driver who crashed his pickup truck into a July Fourth barbecue and killed four people has been convicted of murder in the 2024 wreck in a New York ...

item.title: Judge rejects plea deal for funeral home owner accused of stashing nearly 190 bodies
item.description: A Colorado judge has rejected the plea deal of a funeral home owner accused of stashing nearly 190 decaying bodies in a bug-infested building

item.title: Voter ID measure violates California law, appeals court says
item.description: A California appeals court has ruled that a Huntington Beach measure requiring voter identification at the polls violates state law
